verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בְּהַעֲל֤וֹת <WH5927> would take up יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And it came to pass when the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> Elijah בַּֽסְעָרָ֖ה <WH5591> by a whirlwind הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> into heaven וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> went אֵלִיָּ֛הוּ <WH452> that Elijah וֶאֱלִישָׁ֖ע <WH477> with Elisha מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <WH1537> from Gilgal

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <WH452> And Elijah אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלִישָׁ֜ע <WH477> unto Elisha שֵֽׁב־ <WH3427> Tarry נָ֣א <WH4994> please פֹ֗ה <WH6311> here כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> here I pray thee for the LORD שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> hath sent עַד־ <WH5704> far בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> me to Bethel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <WH477> And Elisha חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [unto him As] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <WH2416> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> and [as] thy soul אִם־ <WH518> I will not אֶעֶזְבֶ֑ךָּ <WH5800> I will not leave וַיֵּרְד֖וּ <WH3381> thee So they went down בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> to Bethel

וַיֵּצְא֨וּ <WH3318> came forth בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֥ים <WH5030> of the prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בֵּֽית־ אֵל֮ <WH1008> that [were] at Bethel אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלִישָׁע֒ <WH477> to Elisha וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him הֲיָדַ֕עְתָּ <WH3045> unto him Knowest כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> age יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> thou that the LORD לֹקֵ֥חַ <WH3947> will take away אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנֶ֖יךָ <WH113> thy master מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> over רֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH7218> from thy head וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> and said גַּם־ <WH1571> Yes אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> Yea I know הֶחֱשֽׁוּ׃ <WH2814> [it] hold ye your peace

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said ל֨וֹ אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <WH452> And Elijah אֱלִישָׁ֣ע ׀ <WH477> unto him Elisha שֵֽׁב־ <WH3427> tarry נָ֣א <WH4994> please פֹ֗ה <WH6311> here כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> here I pray thee for the LORD שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> hath sent יְרִיח֔וֹ <WH3405> me to Jericho וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <WH2416> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> and [as] thy soul אִם־ <WH518> I will not אֶעֶזְבֶ֑ךָּ <WH5800> I will not leave וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> thee So they came יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> to Jericho

וַיִּגְּשׁ֨וּ <WH5066> came בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֥ים <WH5030> of the prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בִּֽירִיחוֹ֮ <WH3405> that [were] at Jericho אֶל־ <WH413> about אֱלִישָׁע֒ <WH477> to Elisha וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him הֲיָדַ֕עְתָּ <WH3045> unto him Knowest כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> age יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> thou that the LORD לֹקֵ֥חַ <WH3947> will take away אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנֶ֖יךָ <WH113> thy master מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> over רֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH7218> from thy head וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> and said גַּם־ <WH1571> Yes אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> Yea I know הֶחֱשֽׁוּ׃ <WH2814> [it] hold ye your peace

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said ל֨וֹ אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <WH452> And Elijah שֵֽׁב־ <WH3427> unto him Tarry נָ֣א <WH4994> Please פֹ֗ה <WH6311> here כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> I pray thee here for the LORD שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> hath sent הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <WH3383> me to Jordan וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <WH2416> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> and [as] thy soul אִם־ <WH518> I will not אֶעֶזְבֶ֑ךָּ <WH5800> I will not leave וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> went שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> thee And they two

וַחֲמִשִּׁ֨ים <WH2572> And fifty אִ֜ישׁ <WH582> another מִבְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> of the sons הַנְּבִיאִים֙ <WH5030> of the prophets הָֽלְכ֔וּ <WH1980> went וַיַּעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> and stood מִנֶּ֖גֶד <WH5048> to view מֵרָח֑וֹק <WH7350> afar off וּשְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> and they two עָמְד֥וּ <WH5975> stood עַל־ <WH5921> by הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> by Jordan

וַיִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> took אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <WH452> And Elijah אֶת־ <WH853> אַדַּרְתּ֤וֹ <WH155> his mantle וַיִּגְלֹם֙ <WH1563> and wrapped [it] together וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> the waters וַיֵּחָצ֖וּ <WH2673> and they were divided הֵ֣נָּה <WH2008> here וָהֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> and there וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> went over שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> hither and thither so that they two בֶּחָרָבָֽה׃ <WH2724> on dry

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become כְעָבְרָ֗ם <WH5674> And it came to pass when they were gone over וְאֵ֨לִיָּ֜הוּ <WH452> that Elijah אָמַ֤ר <WH559> said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלִישָׁע֙ <WH477> unto Elisha שְׁאַל֙ <WH7592> Ask מָ֣ה <WH4100> what אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> what I shall do לָּ֔ךְ בְּטֶ֖רֶם <WH2962> before אֶלָּקַ֣ח <WH3947> for thee before I be taken away מֵעִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <WH477> from thee And Elisha וִֽיהִי־ <WH1961> become נָ֛א <WH4994> Please פִּֽי־ <WH6310> portion שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> I pray thee let a double בְּרוּחֲךָ֖ <WH7307> of thy spirit אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said הִקְשִׁ֣יתָ <WH7185> a hard thing לִשְׁא֑וֹל <WH7592> Thou hast asked אִם־ <WH518> if תִּרְאֶ֨ה <WH7200> [nevertheless] if thou see אֹתִ֜י <WH853> לֻקָּ֤ח <WH3947> me [when I am] taken מֵֽאִתָּךְ֙ <WH853> יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> become לְךָ֣ כֵ֔ן <WH3651> shall be so וְאִם־ <WH518> if אַ֖יִן <WH369> else לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> as they הֹלְכִ֤ים <WH1980> And it came to pass as they still הָלוֹךְ֙ <WH1980> went on וְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> and talked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold רֶֽכֶב־ <WH7393> that behold [there appeared] a chariot אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> of fire וְס֣וּסֵי <WH5483> and horses אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> of fire וַיַּפְרִ֖דוּ <WH6504> and parted בֵּ֣ין <WH996> asunder שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8147> them both וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> went up אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> and Elijah בַּֽסְּעָרָ֖ה <WH5591> by a whirlwind הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> into heaven

וֶאֱלִישָׁ֣ע <WH477> And Elisha רֹאֶ֗ה <WH7200> saw וְה֤וּא <WH1931> he מְצַעֵק֙ <WH6817> [it] and he cried אָבִ֣י ׀ <WH1> My father אָבִ֗י <WH1> my father רֶ֤כֶב <WH7393> the chariot יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וּפָ֣רָשָׁ֔יו <WH6571> and the horsemen וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no רָאָ֖הוּ <WH7200> thereof And he saw ע֑וֹד <WH5750> more וַֽיַּחֲזֵק֙ <WH2388> him no more and he took hold בִּבְגָדָ֔יו <WH899> of his own clothes וַיִּקְרָעֵ֖ם <WH7167> and rent לִשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> them in two קְרָעִֽים׃ <WH7168> pieces

וַיָּ֙רֶם֙ <WH7311> He took up אֶת־ <WH853> אַדֶּ֣רֶת <WH155> also the mantle אֵלִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> of Elijah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that נָפְלָ֖ה <WH5307> that fell מֵעָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וַיָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> from him and went back וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and stood עַל־ <WH5921> by שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> by the bank הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> of Jordan

וַיִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> אַדֶּ֨רֶת <WH155> the mantle אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <WH452> of Elijah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that נָפְלָ֤ה <WH5307> that fell מֵֽעָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <WH5221> from him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> the waters וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> and said אַיֵּ֕ה <WH346> Where יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Where [is] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <WH452> of Elijah אַף־ <WH637> yet ה֣וּא ׀ <WH1931> he וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <WH5221> had struck אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> the waters וַיֵּֽחָצוּ֙ <WH2673> they parted הֵ֣נָּה <WH2008> here וָהֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> and there וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> went over אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <WH477> hither and thither and Elisha

וַיִּרְאֻ֨הוּ <WH7200> saw בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And when the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֤ים <WH5030> of the prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בִּֽירִיחוֹ֙ <WH3405> which [were] to view at Jericho מִנֶּ֔גֶד <WH5048> about וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> him they said נָ֛חָה <WH5117> doth rest ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> The spirit אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <WH452> of Elijah עַל־ <WH5921> on אֱלִישָׁ֑ע <WH477> on Elisha וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> And they came לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <WH7125> to meet וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <WH7812> him and bowed ל֖וֹ אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> themselves to the ground

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֡יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֣א <WH4994> now יֵֽשׁ־ <WH3426> unto him Behold now there be אֶת־ <WH854> are with עֲבָדֶיךָ֩ <WH5650> with thy servants חֲמִשִּׁ֨ים <WH2572> fifty אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> men בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> afflicted חַ֗יִל <WH2428> strong יֵ֣לְכוּ <WH1980> go נָא֮ <WH4994> please וִיבַקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> we pray thee and seek אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנֶיךָ֒ <WH113> thy master פֶּן־ <WH6435> perhaps נְשָׂאוֹ֙ <WH5375> hath taken him up ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> lest peradventure the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּשְׁלִכֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7993> and cast בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> him upon some הֶהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> mountain א֖וֹ <WH176> or בְּאַחַ֣ת <WH259> or into some [הַגְּיָאֹות כ] (הַגֵּאָיֹ֑ות <WH1516> valley ק) וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁלָֽחוּ׃ <WH7971> Ye shall not send

וַיִּפְצְרוּ־ <WH6484> And when they urged ב֥וֹ עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֖שׁ <WH954> him till he was ashamed וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> he said שְׁלָ֑חוּ <WH7971> Send וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> They sent חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> therefore fifty אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men וַיְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> and they sought שְׁלֹשָֽׁה־ <WH7969> three יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not מְצָאֻֽהוּ׃ <WH4672> but found

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> And when they came again אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> to him (for he tarried בִּירִיח֑וֹ <WH3405> Jericho וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> unto them Did I not say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not אָמַ֥רְתִּי <WH559> say אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> nay תֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> along

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> said אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <WH477> unto Elisha הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֞א <WH4994> I beseech thee מוֹשַׁ֤ב <WH4186> Behold I pray thee the situation הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of this city ט֔וֹב <WH2896> [is] pleasant כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> my אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> as my lord רֹאֶ֑ה <WH7200> seeth וְהַמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> but the water רָעִ֖ים <WH7451> [is] naught וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> and the ground מְשַׁכָּֽלֶת׃ <WH7921> barren

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said קְחוּ־ <WH3947> Bring לִי֙ צְלֹחִ֣ית <WH6746> cruse חֲדָשָׁ֔ה <WH2319> me a new וְשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> and put שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it מֶ֑לַח <WH4417> salt וַיִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> therein And they brought אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about
